tags: only acceptable use of the crossbow
summary:
Bronn: *pointing the crossbow at Jaime* Heads up, ya fucker!
Jaime: Bronn??? what are you doing?
Bronn: put your hands up and...
body:
Bronn: *pointing the crossbow at Jaime* Heads up, ya fucker!

Jaime: Bronn??? what are you doing?

Bronn: put your hands up and walk

Jaime: how much is Cersei paying you to kill me?

Bronn: kill you? No I don’t care about that you stupid cunt

Jaime: then wh-

Bronn: you tell Brienne how you feel about her or I really will shoot you with this

from IG semperopernball

summary: Sometimes I think about rewatching Game of Thrones just to enjoy the finale season.  Like, yeah the show has its problems, but...
body:
Sometimes I think about rewatching Game of Thrones just to enjoy the finale season. 

Like, yeah the show has its problems, but it got me onto reading the books which I love much more now, and I met a lot of my internet friends through it. 

But then I think about the Dornish plotline…I think about that whole Sansa/Ramsay thing…I think about the Faith Militant…I think about Stannis…and I just can’t do it.

reblog.comment:

trail.content:
Sometimes I think about rewatching Game of Thrones just to enjoy the finale season. 

Like, yeah the show has its problems, but it got me onto reading the books which I love much more now, and I met a lot of my internet friends through it. 

But then I think about the Dornish plotline…I think about that whole Sansa/Ramsay thing…I think about the Faith Militant…I think about Stannis…and I just can’t do it.

Artist • Photographer • Writer
Globetrotter • Big Nerd

Hello everybody! Welcome to my blog! 
I'm Nike96, Nike for friends :D
This is multi-fandom and an art blog and I hope you'll like this! 
I'm an Italian girl with a great passion for movies, animation, music, TV series, sports (especially F1, basketball, volleyball and horse riding), reading, drawing, photography and anime and manga.

Niki Lauda and Jared Padalecki are my heroes ♥

Enjoy!

P.S. Sorry for my English...

title: GOT Theories
body:
I could have wrote a poem about Got theories before the Season premiere and I still can now, but “This is not the time”. Not yet.

Anyway someone just let me see that in the new opening credit, on one of the ring that move around the light (the Citadel symbol), among the new scenes rapresented on there, there’s a scene were four dragons follow a comet.

Some people say that this is a rappresentation of when Daenerys’ dragons were born, seeing in the bigger dragon Daenerys’s figure while the other three, smaller, could be her dragon Drogon, Rhaegal and Viserion.

But I’m a strong supporter of the theory that put the Lannister twins as not real Lannisters, but as bastard sons of king Aerys (he had a crush for Joanna Lannister and he had a “curious behavior” on the night her and Tywin got married, but you can find the full theory on the internet - if you want I could make a post about it). 

So, if this theory would be true, the four dragon could be a very important clue because they could be represent the last Targaryen still alive:

- Daenerys, the bigger dragon as she is the only true Targaryen recognized as such from other people

- Jon, that now knows that he isn’t a Stark nor a bastard, but the true heir of the Seven Kingdoms

- Jaime

- Cersei

In the case all of this would be true, we will have more Targaryens that we know (it will be ironic knowing that at the beginnig the say that there were only one Targaryen still alive) and even the Azor Ahai theory could be revised.

What do you think about it? (Sorry for my English, I just have to write all of this quickly)
